title: State-Sponsored Terrorism, Crimes, and Lies - Collection 10 (Rus
description:
State-Sponsored Terrorism, Crimes, and Lies - Collection 10 (Russia):

We have 35 titles in this upload. The emphasis here is on the bloody history of Russia and the former Soviet Union, and the atrocities they committed against their own people and against other nations.

-  Apor et al (Eds.) - The Sovietization of Eastern Europe; New Perspectives on the Postwar Period (2008) 

-  Braithwaite - Afgantsy; the Russians in Afghanistan, 1979-1989 (2011)

-  Darraj - The Collapse of the Soviet Union (2010)

-  Davenport - The Bolshevik Revolution (2010)

-  Davies & Wheatcroft - The Years  of Hunger; Soviet Agriculture, 1931-1933 (2009)

-  Dobbs - Down with Big Brother; the Fall of the Soviet Empire (1996)

-  Eastman - Stalin's Russia and the Crisis in Socialism (1940)

-  Figes - A People's Tragedy; a History of the Russian Revolution (1996)

-  Fremont-Barnes - The Soviet-Afghan War, 1979-89 (2012)

-  Geifman - Death Orders; the Vanguard of Modern Terrorism in Revolutionary Russia (2010)

-  Gheith & Jolluck - Gulag Voices; Oral Histories of Soviet Incarceration and Exile (2011)

-  Grau & Gress (Trans. & Eds.) - The Soviet-Afghan War; How a Superpower Fought and Lost (2002)

-  Herlihy - The Alcoholic Empire; Vodka & Politics in Late Imperial Russia (2002)

-  HRW - A Dying Practice; Use of Cluster Munitions by Russia and Georgia in August 2008 (2009)

-  HRW - An Uncivil Approach to Civil Society; Continuing State Curbs on Independent NGOs and Activists in Russia (2009)

-  HRW - What Your Children Do Will Touch Upon You; Punitive House Burning in Chechnya (2009)

-  HRW - Widespread Torture in the Chechen Republic (2006)

-  Judah - Fragile Empire; How Russia Fell in and out of Love with Vladimir Putin (2013)

-  Keep - Last of the Empires; a History of the Soviet Union, 1945-1991 (1995)

-  Kotkin - Armageddon Averted; the Soviet Collapse, 1970-2000 (2001)

-  Lohr - Nationalizing the Russian Empire; the Campaign Against Enemy Aliens During World War I (2003)

-  Offman - The Oligarchs; Wealth and Power in the New Russia (2011)

-  Pipes - The Russian Revolution (1990)

-  Politkovskaya - Dirty War; a Russian Reporter in Chechnya (2001)

-  Radzinsky - Stalin; the First In-Depth Biography Based on Explosive New Documents from Russia's Secret Archives  (1996)

-  Rubenstein & Naumov (Eds.) - Stalin's Secret Pogrom; the Postwar Inquisition of the Jewish Anti-Fascist Committee (2001)

-  Sedia - The Secret History of Moscow (2010)

-  Service - The Penguin History of Modern Russia from Tsarism to the 21st Century (2009)

-  Sheets - 8 Pieces of Empire; a 20-Year Journey through the Soviet Collapse (2011)

-  Shubin - Tsars and Imposters; Russia's Time of Troubles (2009)

-  Stickley - Brain-Washing, a Synthesis of the Russian Text Book on Psychopolitics (1959)

-  Suny - The Soviet Experiment; Russia, the USSR, and the Successor States (1998)

-  Sussex (Ed.) - Conflict in the Former USSR (2012)

-  Varese - The Russian Mafia (2001)

-  Wegren & Herspring (Eds.) - After Putin's Russia; Past Imperfect, Future Uncertain, 4e (2010)
